name: Clacking Skeleton
description: A medium skeleton adorned with scraps of armor, it instills fear with its horrifying clacking sounds.
memorable: Its Horrid Clacking ability can frighten adventurers and disrupt their strategies.
goals: To instill fear in enemies and dominate the battlefield through terror.
relations: Typically found among other undead or summoned by necromancers.
environment: Often found in dark tombs or abandoned battlefields.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and conditions like exhaustion and poison.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to bludgeoning damage which can double the damage received.
attacks: Can attack with a glaive, a gore attack, or shoot from a shortbow.
most_powerful_ability: Horrid Clacking can cause fear in creatures within a 30-foot range.
senses: Has darkvision that allows it to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
skills: Lacks notable skills, but possesses immunities to various conditions.
additional_information: Can make two attacks in a single turn.
Frightens enemies to disrupt their combat tactics.
Attacks include melee and ranged options.
Low intelligence and charisma, limiting its interaction.
test_queries: undead that makes horrible clacking sounds
